member.name: D3D12_MEMORY_POOL
member.summary: Specifies the memory pool for the heap.

member.name: D3D12_MEMORY_POOL.D3D12_MEMORY_POOL_L0
member.summary: The memory pool is L0. L0 is the physical system memory pool. When the adapter is discrete/NUMA, this pool has greater bandwidth for the CPU and less bandwidth for the GPU. When the adapter is UMA, this pool is the only one which is valid.

member.name: D3D12_MEMORY_POOL.D3D12_MEMORY_POOL_L1
member.summary: The memory pool is L1. L1 is typically known as the physical video memory pool. L1 is only available when the adapter is discrete/NUMA, and has greater bandwidth for the GPU and cannot even be accessed by the CPU. When the adapter is UMA, this pool is not available.
